text: and He said to me, “Son of man, this is the place of My throne and the place for the soles of My feet, where I will dwell among the Israelites forever. The house of Israel will never again defile My holy name—neither they nor their kings—by their prostitution and by the funeral offerings 43:7 Or the monuments; also in verse 9  for their kings at their deaths.43:7 Or for their kings on their high places
